# Question 1: Public Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
covid_data <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/master/us-counties.csv")
glimpse(covid_data)
colorado_data <- covid_data %>%
  filter(state == "Colorado")
head(colorado_data)
```

# Question 2: Daily Summary
```{r}
View(population_data)
unique(colorado_data$county)
unique(population_data$COUNTY)
population_data <- population_data %>%
  mutate(COUNTY = str_replace(COUNTY, "County", ""))
colorado_data <- colorado_data %>%
  left_join(population_data, by = c("county" = "county")) %>%
  mutate(cases_per_capita = (cases / population) * 100000, deaths_per_capita = (deaths / population) * 100000)
colorado_data %>%
  filter(is.na(population))
```
